folder: 20th Street (East) & Gramercy Park East, Manhattan, NY
text:
Gramercy Park, southeastern corner of same, as viewed northwestward on East 20th Street (left) at Gramercy Park East (right). This park, a portion of the old Gramercy farm, is a private enclosure of 1 1/2 acres and is located between East 20th and 21st Streets, and Third and Fourth Aves.

May 29, 1909.

Walter L. Bogert.
title: Manhattan: 20th Street (East) - Gramercy Park East

folder: Gramercy Park South & 3rd Avenue, Manhattan, NY
text:
26, 25-24, and 23 (from left to right) Gramercy Park South, south side, between Third Ave., and Irving Place, as seen from Gramercy Park East (foreground). On the right is shown a small portion of Gramercy Park, and in the background the tower of the Consolidated Edison Co. Building, No. 226 is the Hotel Irwing.

July 7, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Manhattan: Gramercy Park South - 3rd Avenue

folder: Gramercy Park East & 21st Street (East), Manhattan, NY
text:
40 & 39 Gramercy Park East, at and adjoining the S. E. corner of East 21st Street. Shown on the extreme right is a portion of the Park.

About 1936.

Gift of Dr. Michael Wishengrad F.R.P.S.
 on all Reproductions.
title: Manhattan: Gramercy Park East - 21st Street (East)
